LanguageData.RF_AC_CraftTreaty.label: 막연한 희망 (차가운 비)
LanguageData.RF_AC_CraftTreaty.description: 정상적인 품질 이상의 도덕적 조약을 제정합니다.
LanguageData.RF_AC_TreatyFirstKill.label: 돌아오지 않는 목소리
LanguageData.RF_AC_TreatyFirstKill.description: Have a colonist kill a human using a Virtuous Treaty.
LanguageData.RF_AC_TreatyManyKills.label: 끔찍한 무기
LanguageData.RF_AC_TreatyManyKills.description: Kill 50 humans using a Virtuous Treaty.
LanguageData.RF_AC_CraftGae.label: 발음하기 힘들어
LanguageData.RF_AC_CraftGae.description: Craft a gáe bulg of normal quality or higher.
LanguageData.RF_AC_GaeFirstKill.label: 찔러 뚫는 죽음의 가시 창
LanguageData.RF_AC_GaeFirstKill.description: Have a colonist kill a human using a gáe bulg.
LanguageData.RF_AC_GaeManyKills.label: 봉충
LanguageData.RF_AC_GaeManyKills.description: Kill 50 humans using a gáe bulg.
LanguageData.RF_AC_BuildCoilgun.label: 과잉 살상 가능성
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilgunFarPen.label: 월방
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilgunFarPen.description: Kill a pawn with the Coilgun after shooting through 20 solid tiles.
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilgunMultikill.label: 멈출 수 없어 멈출 수 없어
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilgunMultikill.description: Kill 5 pawns with a single AP or SP Coilgun shell.
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilgunExplosion.label: 도망쳐
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilgunExplosion.description: Kill 10 pawns with a single HE Coilgun shell.
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilgunHighDamage.label: 5000이 넘었다고요?
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilgunHighDamage.description: Kill at least 1 pawn and deal a total of over 5000 damage with a single Coilgun shot.
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilgunMany.label: 예상치 못했던 일
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilgunMany.description: Kill 200 pawns with the Liandry Coilgun.
LanguageData.RF_AC_BuildForge.label: 핫 토픽
LanguageData.RF_AC_CraftBronze.label: 청동기 시대
LanguageData.RF_AC_CraftAdamantium.label: 매우 뜨거운 주제
LanguageData.RF_AC_BuildPower.label: 몰입형 엔지니어링
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilZap.label: 비자발적 전기 요법
LanguageData.RF_AC_CoilZap.description: Zap an enemy with a Tesla Coil.
LanguageData.RF_AC_DroneNuke.label: 불공평해 보인다
LanguageData.RF_AC_DroneNuke.description: Drop an Antigrain Warhead from a strike drone.
LanguageData.RF_AC_DroneNukeMany.label: 메시지 보내기
LanguageData.RF_AC_DroneNukeMany.description: Drop 6 Antigrain Warheads from a strike drone in a single run.
LanguageData.RF_AC_RitualDone.label: 너무 비싼건 없습니다.
LanguageData.RF_AC_RitualDone.description: Complete the Blessing Ritual using the Ritual Core.
LanguageData.RF_AC_RitualRisky.label: 용맹함
LanguageData.RF_AC_RitualRisky.description: Begin a Blessing Ritual with a >50% chance of failure.
LanguageData.RF_AC_RitualFailure.label: 태양에 너무 가까워요.
LanguageData.RF_AC_RitualFailure.description: Perform too many rituals and incurr the wrath of Zir.
LanguageData.RF_AC_DualWeapons.label: 치명적인 정밀도
LanguageData.RF_AC_DualWeapons.description: Craft 1 of each Stable weapon variety, minumum Masterwork level.
